original_title: President calls for all party conference
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); President Ranil Wickremesinghe has called for an all party conference to discuss national reconciliation.
General Secretary of the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna Attorney Sagara Kariyawasam said the conference will be held at the President's Office at 5pm on Wednesday (26).
The 13th Amendment to the Constitution will also be discussed.
The SLPP General Secretary said political parties representing Parliament will attend the conference.
MP Vijitha Herath said the Jathika Jana Balawegaya reached a decision to boycott the all party conference.
He added that the decision was reached over the President's failure to fulfill promises made so far regarding solving national issues.
